thread.title: GE Minions Suffer as Execs Deploy Golden Parachutes

author: wsjcom
title: GE Minions Suffer as Execs Deploy Golden Parachutes
text: It’s sad and unjust that the hardworking minions who dedicated their entire careers to generating multiple millions of dollars for General Electric Co., helping to build value in the company, now will pay the tab for the executives who destroyed the company with poor decision-making and greed (“‘Success Theater’ Masked Rot at GE,” page one, Feb. 22). My brother will retire very soon, so it is too late for him to recoup all the lost stock earnings that he helped to build. But the people who destroyed the once iconic brand known for “genius” will walk away with multimillion-dollar golden parachutes instead of sharing the...
